summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Mary Avenue Northwest, in the co, from West Seventieth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 1570 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
